amendment.description: Amendment provides that a State receiving funds shall require that the appropriate public authorities report promptly to the Attorney General the death of each individual who dies in custody while in a municipal or county jail, State prison, or other similar place of confinement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require a report to the Attorney General on the number of individuals who die while in custody at places of confinement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
